name: Shmup with Touhou Circle Music
description:
A Shoot'em'up type of game with stage enemies, and a boss with bullet patterns

This is inspired by the Touhou Project's playstyle, though the only similarity seen in this game might be the bullet patterns instead of the sci-fi looking sprites. The sprite assets are found from Open Game Art.

Audio credits are put in the Feature Doc that comes with the game download, I do notice that there are a looooot of FELT songs in there.

It is advised to turn down your audio a little before hitting the Play button, it might be loud and there is no in-game volume slider. Otherwise, enjoy the circle music while playing!

Controls:

  • Move: WASD / Arrow Keys / Numpad Keys
  • Shoot: Hold Space
  • Exit Game: Alt + F4 / Close Window

P.S. Why is this called Shmup? I always misspell it as "Shump".
